}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Intended for use with the Patriot Memory Box Office All-in-one Media Player PCMPBO25
This device is assumed to be a [[CC&C WL-6203-V1]] based on its appearance, chipset, and OUI.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.pricebat.ca/pcbowau2-n-patriot-wi-fi-usb-wireless-lan-adapter-ieee-802-11/ USB ID mention], [http://www.patriotmemory.com/forums/archive/index.php/t-7250.html?s=a87628fbbd4206840dc48ec68a55c692 OUI (00:02:72) mention]
